divs: Sighting DetailsApproximately 10p.m. in early July 2007 a friend and i were outside looking northbound in the sky near dynette world. All of a sudden a steady bright white light traveled across the sky in a eastern direction for about 20 seconds and all of a sudden the steady bright white light turned red for about 2 seconds and suddenly took off and disappeared. A couple seconds later we spotted a steady tiny red dot in the sky but it was traveling in a north direction. The red dot was 3 fingers distance and one tenth the size from the bright white light.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wilmington
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright Light turn red in North Wilmington,ma
